actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that tax exempt interest is to be added into average base period income for purposes of income averaging.

summary.text: Provides that tax-exempt interest is to be added into average base period income for purposes of income averaging under the Internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 1302(b)(2)(A)(i))

titles.title: A bill to provide that tax exempt interest is to be added into average base period income for purposes of income averaging.
